728662f-a.text:
Castleton Ate., north side (houses thereon), east from State Street to Broadway. The view is from State Street.
March 24, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
728662f-a.folder: Castleton Avenue & State Street, Staten Island, NY

729700f-a.text:
85 State Street, east side, between Castleton Avenue and Noale Place, showing the West New Brighton sub-branch of the New York Public Library. The sub-branch moved to the above address from 848 Castleton Avenue in 1923. In 1932 the sub-branch became a branch of the New York Public Library and moved into
new quarters at 976 Castleton Avenue.
1924
P. L. Sperr
729700f-a.folder: State Street & Castleton Avenue, Staten Island, NY
